message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. Considering its value and quality, I believe we can reach a fair agreement. I propose a price of $10000 for the product. I hope this offer aligns with your expectations and budget.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to stay within my budget of $8000. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $8500. I believe this price is more in line with what I'm comfortable paying, and I'm hoping we can come to a mutually agreeable price.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. To further explore a potential agreement, I would like to propose a price of $9000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the value of the item.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I'm still trying to stay within my budget of $8000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $8800. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial price.

I appreciate your continued interest in our product, Bob. After considering your latest offer, I am willing to accept $8700 for the product. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between our positions, allowing us to move forward with a transaction that benefits both parties.

Alice, I appreciate your latest offer, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. I'm willing to make one last counteroffer. I'd like to propose a price of $8200. I believe this is the best we can do, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.

Thank you for your final counteroffer, Bob. I've taken into account all our previous discussions and am willing to accept $8500 for the product. I believe this price is reasonable for both of us and would allow us to conclude this negotiation successfully.
